failedToJoinMeeting.note: Error message displayed when an error has occurred joining a meeting.

failedToLoadDebugger.note: Error message displayed when the debug page fails to load.

userMedia/fallback.note: Error message displayed for a fallback user media error

userMedia/permissionsDenied.text: You must allow access to both your camera and microphone
userMedia/permissionsDenied.note: Error message displayed for denied device permissions.

displayMedia/fallback.note: Error message displayed for a fallback display media error

displayMedia/permissionsDenied.text: You must allow access to capture your screen
displayMedia/permissionsDenied.note: Error message displayed for denied screen share permissions.

displayMedia/freeSlotTimedOut.note: Error message displayed when a free slot attempt has timed out.

stage/fallback.note: Error message displayed for a fallback stage error

stage/JOIN_ERROR.note: Error message displayed when an attempt to join a stage has failed.

stage/PUBLISH_ERROR.text: Failed to publish to the stage
stage/PUBLISH_ERROR.note: Error message displayed when an attempt to publish to a stage has failed.

stage/PUBLISH_ERROR/STAGE_AT_CAPACITY.text: Stage is at capacity to publish
stage/PUBLISH_ERROR/STAGE_AT_CAPACITY.note: Error message displayed when an attempt to publish to a stage has failed due to capacity.

broadcast/fallback.note: Error message displayed for a fallback broadcast error

broadcast/ConnectionTimeoutError.text: It's taking longer than usual to start broadcasting. Check your Internet connection and disable any VPNs.
broadcast/ConnectionTimeoutError.note: Error message displayed when the WebRTC connection takes too long to be established.

broadcast/IngestEndpointUrlError.text: Ingest endpoint must be a valid https or rtmps URL
broadcast/IngestEndpointUrlError.note: Error message displayed when an invalid ingest endpoint was provided.

broadcast/InvalidStreamKey.note: Error message displayed an invalid stream key was provided.

chat/fallback.note: Error message displayed for a fallback chat error

chat/401.note: Error message displayed for an unauthorized chat error

chat/403.text: You are not allowed to perform this chat action
chat/403.note: Error message displayed for a forbidden chat error

chat/406.text: Chat message rejected by message review
chat/406.note: Error message displayed for a notAcceptable chat error

chat/413.note: Error message displayed for a payloadTooLarge chat error

chat/429.note: Error message displayed for a tooManyRequests chat error

usernameValidation.text: Only numbers, letters, periods (.) and underscores (_) are allowed.

passwordsDoNotMatch.note: Error message for passwords that do not match

usernameExists.note: Error message displayed when the provided username already exists

emailExists.note: Error message displayed when the provided email already exists

emailDomainForbidden.note: Error message displayed when the provided email domain is forbidden

incorrectCredentials.note: Error message displayed during sign-in when the provided username and/or password are incorrect

somethingWentWrong.note: Generic error message displayed when an unexpected error has occurred
